content: crochet pattern the lamb zina hello my name is nastya pastukhova i am a designer of this lamb please be free to ask me any question regarding this pattern through вконтакте or instagram@nasie knit share the photos of your ready items with the hashtag #мк_nasie this pattern is a work of authorship and it intends only for personal use full or partial reproduction and distribution sales and publications of this pattern on the internet is forbidden the required materials yarn yarnart jeans 55% cotton 45% acrylic 50 g/160 m in cream color white hook size 2 25 mm fiberfill for stuffing teething ring section 7cm rattle bead black and white yarn for embroidery stitch marker yarn needle scissors terms and abbreviation us magic_ring magic_ring chain -chain t-chain turn chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet dc4tog cluster - double_crochet 4 together cluster - crochet four unfinished double crochets in one place you now have five loops on the hook and draw yarn through all five loops increase - increase decrease - decrease х 6 times repeat or other number as instructed * number of stitches in the round this pattern is worked in continues rounds without joining the rounds unless otherwise indicated head work with cream- colored yarn 1 start 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 2 6 increase = 12 3 1 single_crochet increase *6 = 18 4 2 single_crochet increase *6 = 24 5 1 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase *5 2 single_crochet = 30 change to white yarn 6 half_double_crochet dc4tog cluster * 15 = 30 7 4 single_crochet increase *6 = 36 8 half_double_crochet dc4tog cluster * 18 = 36 9 5 single_crochet increase *6 = 42 10 half_double_crochet dc4tog cluster *21 = 42 11 5 single_crochet decrease *6 = 36 12 half_double_crochet dc4tog cluster * 18 = 36 13 1 single_crochet decrease *12 = 24 14 half_double_crochet dc4tog cluster * 12 = 24 stuff the head with fiberfill and add rattle bead continue stuffing as you go 15 12 decrease 16 half_double_crochet dc4tog cluster *6 = 12 17 6 decrease fasten_off leaving a tall for sewing using your yarn needle weave the yarn tall through the front loop of each remaining stitch and pull it tight closing of the back of the head weave in the yarn end ears make 2 cream color 1 start 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 2 2 single_crochet increase *2 = 8 3-6 8 single_crochet fasten_off leaving a tall for sewing sew the ears to each side of the head embroider eyes and nose crochet teething ring the rings is crocheted using traditional turn rounds 1 25 chain 1 t-chain 2-9 25 single_crochet 1 t-chain fasten_off leaving a tall for sewing wrap the ring in the rectangle sew two sides together sew the head to the ring the toy is ready
